issue.title: Let contact manager process contacts even without subscribers

content.raw:
I think the default behavior should be to wait for the flag to be set. It sounds like the current implementation doesn't process them by default because it's expensive.

A subscriber should automatically enable processing too. It matches the current behavior, and without it there has to be a gazebo plugin to enable contact processing before a standalone subscriber will receive data.
